thread.title: Your first look at 'Avengers: Infinity War' - CNET
thread.title_full: Your first look at 'Avengers: Infinity War' - CNET

author: Sean Hollister
title: Your first look at 'Avengers: Infinity War' - CNET
text:
@starfire2258 
Iron Man. Spider-Man. Guardians of the Galaxy. Doctor Strange . They're all together in "Avengers: Infinity War," the culmination of Marvel's superhero epic, where they'll fight the ultimate supervillain . 
What might that look like? Behold, Marvel's just-released featurette from January 23, 2017 -- the first day of shooting. 
It's some of the very first concept art we've seen from the film, some major hints about what's to come -- and perhaps why "Captain America: Civil War" was so important. 
Read more about "Avengers: Infinity War" right here .
